trans-unit.source: This field must not be empty!
Field "%s" has to be at least %d characters long!
trans-unit.target: U polju "%s" je %d najmanji dopušteni broj znakova!

trans-unit.source: Field "%s" must not be longer than %d characters!
trans-unit.target: U polju "%s" nemora biti više od %d znakova!

trans-unit.source: Please enter a percentage between 0 and 100!
Please enter a valid phone number!
For security reasons you can not use the following characters here: =<>&/()#
trans-unit.target: Iz sigurnosnih razloga znakovi (=&/()#) ne mogu se koristiti!

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid e-mail address!
There is at least one invalid e-mail address!
Please enter a valid URL format and encode special characters!
trans-unit.target: Upišite ispravan URL format i kodirajte specijalne znakove!

trans-unit.source: Please enter only alphanumeric characters and the following special characters: .-_
Please enter only alphanumeric characters and the following special characters: .-/_
Please enter date and time as "%s"!
Field "%s" must not contain any whitespace characters!
The maximum size for file uploads is %s (Contao or php.ini settings)!
trans-unit.target: Najveća dozvoljena veličina fajla za upload je %s kB!

trans-unit.source: File type "%s" is not allowed to be uploaded!
File %s exceeds the maximum image width of %d pixels!
trans-unit.target: Slika % prekoračuje najveću dozvoljenu širinu od %d piksela!

trans-unit.source: File %s exceeds the maximum image height of %d pixels!
trans-unit.target: Slika % prekoračuje najveću dozvoljenu visinu od %d piksela!

trans-unit.source: Access denied! The current host address (%s) does not match the referer host address (%s)!
trans-unit.target: Zabranjen pristup! Host adresa (%s) ne odgovara ciljnoj adresi (%s)!

trans-unit.source: A password has to be at least %d characters long!
Your username and password must not be the same!
trans-unit.target: Vaše korisničko ime i lozinka moraju se razlikovati!

trans-unit.source: This account has been locked! You can log in again in %d minutes.
trans-unit.target: Ovaj korisnički račun je blokiran! Ulogavanje je ponovo moguće nakon %d minuta.

trans-unit.source: Please select at least one field!
The file "%s" is not writeable and can therefore not be updated!
trans-unit.target: Fajl "%s" nema određenu dozvolu (permissions), tako da vaše izmjene nece biti ažurirane!

trans-unit.source: This file or folder name is invalid!
The file or folder "%s" is invalid!
Attention! Your web browser is %sout of date%s and you cannot use all features of this website.

None of the active website root pages without an explicit DNS setting has the language fallback option set, which means that these websites are only available in the one language you have defined in the page settings! Visitors and search engines who do not speak this language will not be able to browse your website.

None of the active website root pages for %s has the language fallback option set, which means that these websites are only available in the one language you have defined in the page settings! Visitors and search engines who do not speak this language will not be able to browse your website.
You can only define one website root page per domain as language fallback.
Top-level pages must be website root pages!

There are pages on the top-level which are not website root pages. Creating websites without a website root page is no longer supported, so please ensure that all pages are grouped under a website root page.
The link you were trying to open could not be verified. If you have clicked the link yourself or have received it by a trustworthy person, you can confirm the process below.
This element still uses the old Contao 2 SRC format. Did you upgrade the database?
The form could not be sent

trans-unit.target: Molimo vas da odgovorite na sigurnosno pitanje!

trans-unit.source: File "%s" is not available for download!
No database entry found for %s. Please synchronize the file system.
What is the sum of %d and %d?
Allows you to add custom HTML code.
trans-unit.target: Dozvoljava da dodate standardni HTML kod.

trans-unit.source: Generates an ordered or unordered list.

trans-unit.target: Generira mootools ploču s accordionom (na razvlačenje).

trans-unit.source: Highlights code snippets and prints them to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ističe dijeliće koda i ispisuje ih na ekranu.

trans-unit.source: Generates a link to another website.
Generates a link to jump to the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Generira link za skok na vrh stranice.

trans-unit.source: Generates a video or audio player.
Generates a link to download a file.
Generates multiple links to download files.
trans-unit.target: Generira višestruke linkove za download fajlova.

trans-unit.source: Displays the teaser text of an article.
A regular page contains articles and content elements. It is the default page type.
trans-unit.target: Obična stranica sadrži članke i elemente sadržaja. Ona je standardni vrsta stranice.

trans-unit.source: This type of page automatically redirects visitors to an external website. It works like a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Ova stranica automatski preusmjerava na vanjski URL i ponaša se kao link.

trans-unit.source: This type of page automatically forwards visitors to another page within the site structure.
trans-unit.target: Ova stranica automatski preusmjerava posjetitelje na drugu stranicu u strukturi sajta.

trans-unit.source: This type of page marks the starting point of a new website within the site structure.
trans-unit.target: Ova vrsta stranice je početna tačka novog sajta u strukturi vašeg sajta.

trans-unit.source: If a user requests a protected page without permission, a 403 error page will be loaded instead.
trans-unit.target: Stranica se prikazuje kad korisnik pokušava pristupiti stranici za koju nema ovlasti. Umjesto te stranice prikazuje se stranica s 403 greškom.

trans-unit.source: If a user requests a non-existent page, a 404 error page will be loaded instead.
trans-unit.target: Ova stranica prikazuje se kad korisnik pokušava pristupiti nepostojećoj ili nedostupnoj stranici. Umjesto tih stranica prukazuje se stranica s 404 greškom.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the file operations you want to allow.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete odrediti koje će radnje sa fajlovima biti dozvoljenje.

trans-unit.source: Edit, copy or move files and folders
trans-unit.target: Edituj, kopiraj ili premjesti fajlove i mape

trans-unit.source: Delete single files and empty folders
trans-unit.target: Izbriši pojedinačne fajlove i prazne mape

trans-unit.source: Delete folders including all files and subfolders (!)
trans-unit.target: Izbriši mape sa svim njihovim fajlovima i podmapama

trans-unit.source: Edit files in the source editor
Please enter a web address (http://…), an e-mail address (mailto:…) or an insert tag.
trans-unit.target: Upišite web adresu (http://…), E-mail adresu (mailto:…) ili ubacite tag.

trans-unit.source: Open the link in a new browser window.
trans-unit.target: Ovaj se link otvara u novom prozoru preglednika (browsera).

trans-unit.source: Please upload the CSV files to be imported.
Import list items from a CSV file
Move the element one position up
Move the element one position down
Import table items from a CSV file
Move the row one position up
Move the row one position down
Move the column one position left
Move the column one position right
Move the row one position up
Move the row one position down
Move the row one position up
Move the row one position down
The longer side of the image is adjusted to the given dimensions and the image is resized proportionally.
The shorter side of the image is adjusted to the given dimensions and the image is resized proportionally.
Preserves the left part of a landscape image and the top part of a portrait image.
Preserves the center part of a landscape image and the top part of a portrait image.
Preserves the right part of a landscape image and the top part of a portrait image.
Preserves the left part of a landscape image and the center part of a portrait image.
Preserves the center part of a landscape image and the center part of a portrait image.
Preserves the right part of a landscape image and the center part of a portrait image.
Preserves the left part of a landscape image and the bottom part of a portrait image.
Preserves the center part of a landscape image and the bottom part of a portrait image.
Preserves the right part of a landscape image and the bottom part of a portrait image.
Note that changing the ID can break data integrity!
trans-unit.target: Ne zaboravite da izmjena ID-a (jedinstvenog identifikacijskog broja) može dovesti do narušavanja integriteta i strukture odnosa među podacima.

trans-unit.source: Note that changing the parent ID can break data integrity!
trans-unit.target: Roditeljski ID je jedinstveni identifikacijski broj hijerarhijski višeg podatka u odnosu na posmatrani podatak. Ne zaboravite da izmjene roditeljskog ID-a mogu dovesti do narušavanja integriteta i hijerarhijske strukture odnose među podacima.

trans-unit.source: The sorting value is usually assigned automatically.
trans-unit.target: Vrijednost sortiranja obično se dodijeljuje automatski, a služi za slaganje podataka u određeni redoslijed.

trans-unit.source: Please select the fields you want to edit.
Move the item one position up
trans-unit.target: Premjestiti objekat za jedno mjesto iznad!

trans-unit.source: Move the item one position down
trans-unit.target: Premjestiti objekat za jedno mjesto ispod

trans-unit.source: The files URL applies to the files directory (page speed optimization).
The assets URL applies to the assets directory (page speed optimization).
Learn more about speeding up your workflow by using keyboard shortcuts.
A Contao account has been locked

The following Contao account has been locked for security reasons.
Username: %s Real name: %s Website: %s
The account has been locked for %d minutes, because the user has entered an invalid password three times in a row. After this period of time, the account will be unlocked automatically.
This e-mail has been generated by Contao. You can not reply to it directly.
Preview of the website in a new window
Go to the top of the page
Back to the back end start page
Do you really want to delete entry ID %s?
trans-unit.target: Zaista želite izbrisati unos s ID %s?

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete the selected records?
trans-unit.target: Zaista želite izbrisati sve odabrane podatke?

trans-unit.source: Open full size image in a new window
trans-unit.target: Otvori sliku u punoj veličini u novom prozoru
Contao verzija %s je dostupna za download

trans-unit.source: ATTENTION! You will lose any unsaved changes. Continue?
trans-unit.target: UPOZORENJE! Izgubit će te sve izmjene koje niste sačuvali. Nastaviti...?

trans-unit.source: Open file manager in a popup window
trans-unit.target: Otvori menadžer fajlova u popup prozoru

trans-unit.source: You have to allow cookies to use Contao.
trans-unit.target: Morate dozvoliti cookies da bi mogli koristiti Contao

trans-unit.source: Contao is currently running in safe mode, in which only core modules are loaded, to prevent possible incompatibilities with third-party extensions (e.g. after a Live Update). After you have checked the installed extensions, you can disable the safe mode again.
Unable to process the current request.
trans-unit.target: Nismo u mogućnosti obraditi sadašnji zahtijev.

trans-unit.source: A new member (ID %s) has registered at your website.%sIf you did not allow e-mail activation, you have to enable the account manually in the back end.
trans-unit.target: Novi korisnik (ID %s) registrirao se na vašoj web stranici. %sAko niste dozvolili E-mail aktivaciju, morate ručno uključiti ovaj korisnički račun u Backend-u.

trans-unit.source: The two selected versions are identical.
Next, please choose the (new) position of the element
Please enter your username and password!
trans-unit.target: Molimo vas da upišete korisničko ime i lozinku!

trans-unit.source: Your search for %s returned no results.
trans-unit.target: Vaša pretraga za %s nije dala rezultate.

trans-unit.source: Image %s uploaded successfully, however it is too big to be resized automatically.
trans-unit.target: Slika %s uspješno je uploadirana, ali je prevelika za automatsku izmjenu njene veličine.

trans-unit.source: Image %s uploaded successfully and was scaled down to the maximum dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Fajl %s je uploadiran i smanjen na maksimalno dozvoljene dimenzije.
Žao nam je ali objekt %s ne postoji.

trans-unit.source: Drag the items to re-order them
Use the mouse wheel to quickly change value
